channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 17:51 Air alarm to Sumy Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 17:51 Air alarm to Sumy Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Sumy_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 17:50 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Find out, the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 17:50 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Find out, the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#m_nikopol_that_thapolska_nikopol. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 17:16 Flashing anxiety in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 17:16 Flashing anxiety in the Kharkiv region.
